display_long_description:
Simplify your 3D prototyping process! Create 3D models quickly and easily using VR and GenAI.

Designed for creativity, simplified for you:
- Jumpstart your 3D creation journey. No prior experience is needed.
- Say goodbye to complexity with our user-friendly interface.

===============
NEW: ‘Masterpiece X - Generate’ is now in VR! 

Our generative AI is the first text-to-3D tool to enable the creation of assets with mesh, textures, and animations (for human models only).

With only a few words, generate completely rigged & animated characters, animals, and objects - and then remix them - all from right inside your Meta Quest headset!
===============

With Masterpiece X, you can unlock an entirely new way to create 3D assets by:
- GENERATING a complete 3D model: character, animal, or object - using text-to-3D generative AI (get 250 bonus credits FREE, additional credit purchases are available)
- REMIXING any part of your model - from mesh to texturing, rigging, and animation
- FINDING FREE-TO-USE models in the community library (or import your own)
- EXPORTING your model to your game, virtual world, or creative project
- SHARING it with our community to inspire & help others!

Masterpiece X is NOT a good fit  for creators who want:
- Elaborate control over simplicity
- A VR version of traditional 3D modeling tools

Embark on your 3D creation adventure – Get Masterpiece X today and transform your ideas into reality!
